<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Regenerate CFT for an Existing Account</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/cloudAccounts/awsLoggingAccounts/{accountId}/cft"}></MethodEndpoint>



Dynamically generate a CFT for an existing Log Account.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"accountId","in":"path","description":"Account ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

success

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

bad_request

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

Account or bucket not found.

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
